txt.en: The dwarf Glóin headed north into the Misty Mountains to seek old remembrance and find a bit of sport. His camp can be found to the west of the path that leads north out of Rivendell.\n\nGlóin and his companions are in need of aid.

'Look here: an adventurous soul.

'It is good to see you. Look about you: there is many a dwarf here, and all with something or other to do. I never thought that seeing these mountains would restore such vigour in me, but I feel better already.

'If you are looking for work, we have it, I promise you this.'
Glóin, one of the companions of the great Thorin Oakenshield, requires aid at his encampment north of Rivendell in the Misty Mountains.
You have arrived in the Misty Mountains
Glóin's camp is west off of the road that leads up and north out of Rivendell. Seek him out and speak with him.
Talk to Glóin at his camp in the Misty Mountains
Glóin's camp is west off of the road that leads up and north out of Rivendell. Seek him out and speak with him.
